children.name: Motivated
quotes: Motivated to put supervision and the justice system behind them.
Most likely they have some positive social support from friends or family.
May have trauma in their past.
Most likely has recreational drug use in their past or are overcoming addiction.
May need to move away from negative social ties.
May have multiple convictions in their past.

children.name: Wants to put low level crime history behind them
quotes: If I'm not spending time with people then I am digitally connected [with them].
The phone is my preferred communication style; I feel that everything is better understood.

children.name: I know how the system works this time.
I'm a grown up this time; I’ll pass the test.
Knowledgeable about system, with past trauma and recreational drug use
quotes: Having to call in regularly for checkups is better, safer.
I use my phone for music, YouTube, phone call, job searching, emails, and texting my daughter, boyfriend, and family.

children.name: [This is the] the first time in a long time I'm doing good. I’m proud of myself.

Some people say I'm hard to get along with.
Addicted to drugs or alcohol, has positive support, desire to change lifestyle
quotes: Oh, wait. My phone number has changed.

children.name: I get into a little bit of trouble, so [I say] f*** it. That’s really the kind of attitude I get in. I’m just making it worse [and] adding to it.

Lacks clarity and support
quotes: Most likely uses drugs recreationally.

children.name: Needs assurances and does not understand process
quotes: I use my phone for everything: tracking calories, emails, etc.

children.name: It’s so amazing how this can happen without being convicted.

quotes: Communication in a city is paramount, you can’t do anything without communication and transportation.
I don’t have my phone - I mean that’s another thing; I’m a loser.

children.name: I don’t even know when it was that’s how messed up I was. That’s how lost I was. Everything is a blur.

quotes: Oh, wait. My phone number has changed.

children.name: I just got to stop hanging out with certain other people.

quotes: Tend to be in their early twenties.

children.name: Young, uninvested, flaunting rules, clever

quotes: I really appreciate you responding to me.
